程序包 org.bupt.persosnalfinance.Back.Service

类 BudgetAIService

java.lang.Object
org.bupt.persosnalfinance.Back.Service.BudgetAIService
public class BudgetAIService extends Object
Service for interacting with an AI text‐generation endpoint to produce personalized budgets and budget advice based on user info and actual spending.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    static final String
    API_KEY
    API key for authenticating with the text‐generation service.
    static final String
    API_URL
    Endpoint URL for the text‐generation service.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • BudgetAIService

      public BudgetAIService()

  • 方法详细资料

    • buildPrompt

      public static String buildPrompt(UserInfo user)
      Constructs a prompt string for the AI model based on the provided user information. The prompt requests a JSON object mapping 12 budget categories to amounts.
      参数:
      user - the UserInfo containing occupation, income, city, dependents, etc.
      返回:
      a formatted prompt to send to the AI service

    • generateBudget

      public static Map<String,Double> generateBudget(UserInfo user)
      Calls the AI text‐generation API to retrieve a budget allocation. Parses the JSON response into a Map of category→amount, then adjusts totals to exactly match the user's disposable income.
      参数:
      user - the UserInfo used to build the prompt
      返回:
      a Map from each category name to its allocated budget amount

    • getActualSpendingFromJson

      public static Map<String,Double> getActualSpendingFromJson(String filePath)
      Reads a JSON file containing a list of TransactionInformation records, filters them to the current month, and sums amounts by category.
      参数:
      filePath - the path to the JSON file with transaction data
      返回:
      a Map from category name to total spent this month

    • generateSuggestion

      public static String generateSuggestion(UserInfo user, Map<String,Double> actual)
      Builds and sends a prompt to the AI service combining user info and actual spending, then returns the AI's textual budget advice.
      参数:
      user - the UserInfo with profile and income data
      actual - a Map of actual spending by category this month
      返回:
      a single‐paragraph suggestion string from the AI
